originalText.text:
What a 1st time experience. Did my appointment with Dr. Collado 2 months in advance. Wasted  3 hours of my life for the lovely staff to tell me the Dr Collado was out on vacation until August. I have to call myself to confirm the appointment and at neither time it was provided the Dr. Was out of on vacation. You guys deserve 0 star on patiente services. You guys really need services classes. Just because you are in Washington hHeighs does not mean we don't deserve the curtersy od a phone call
Sincerely Martha Diaz

originalText.text: Very rude. I have been coming for sometime but after my experience today; I will not longer continue with this clinic. I called in to see the Doctor and the person I spoke to on the phone with was so very rude. I at least deserve to feel valued as a patient. I understand the office gets busy but customer service should never fall short.

originalText.text:
Doctor Collado and Doctor Peter have been a blessing in my life. For nearly 10 years I have been under their care. Not a day goes by that  I don't thank God and  appreciate, their service, time and dedication.

The new facility is beautiful  on Broadway.

I pray that those that come for their care, can feel just as safe and healthy as I feel. Stellar Doctors.

Prior to your appointment, call to confirm.
( self awareness)
Plan according to your time of appointment.
I invite you to keep an honest line of communication upon your visit with the Doctors so that they may work effectively to help you obtain a healthy state.

Thank you for taking care of me Dr. Collado and Dr. Peter.

originalText.text: Dr. Peter is a great diagnostician and NP Giosely Collado is a great women’s Health practitioner as well as a provider with compassion and is culturally competent in her delivery of services. Highly recommended health care providers!

originalText.text: Do not use Dr. Peter! he is a LIAR! and doesn't check you properly just criticize you for coming in. Makes you feel uncomfortable and makes you wait 3 hours before he will see you.
